p: Total protein was separated on a 4%–20% SDS-PAGE gel (Precise; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) at a constant current of 20 mA. The proteins on the gel were then transferred onto a nitrocellulose membrane using the iBlot 7-Minute Blotting System (Life Technologies). NP and NS1 antibodies used for the western blot were obtained from Influenza Reagents Repository and Dr. Adolfo Garcia-Sastre, and the antibody against β-actin was purchased from Millipore Sigma (St. Louis, MO, USA).
